pageProduct.name: Alya Skin Pomegranate Facial Exfoliator 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Deeply exfoliates and cleanses your skin. Vegan and cruetly free.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of direct sunlight. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth area. If irritations occurs, cease use. 

Common Uses

Deeply exfoliates and cleanses your skin, extracting pollutants and other nasties, helping you get rid of acne and pimples. For best results, use before application of Alya Skin Pink Clay Mask. Safe for sensitive skin.

Ingredients

Aqua, Caprylic/Capric triglyceride, Cellulose acetate, Stearic acid, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) oil, Glycerine, Cetearyl alcohol, Punica granatum pericarp (Pomegranate) extract, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet almond) oil, Macadamia integrifolia (Macadamia) seed oil, Punica granatum (Pomegranate) seed powder, Potassium cetyl phosphate, Pelargonium roseum (Geranium rose) stem oil, Phenethyl alcohol, Caprylyl glycol, Xanthan gum, Sodium hydroxide, Citronellol, Geraniol, CI 16035.

Directions

Apply the exfoliator to the T-Zone area of your face on a DAILY BASIS. Rub gently in circular motions.
